title: Hot on Her Trail
description: Jacob McCoy wishes for a wife and a family. Tis the Season for miracles when a young woman shows up on his homeless, in danger and expecting a child - Jacob's child.Their relationship is complicated by the fact that, A - they've never met before and B - she's a virgin. Jessie is determined not to be a burden to the McCoy family. As far as she's concerned, she is just passing through. Jacob has a different opinion - he wants Jessie in his life, in his bed and in his heart. A sweet and spicy romance with another McCoy brother!
author: Sable Hunter
